original_text: I will give the priests plenty of good things. My people will have everything that they need, because of all the good things that I give to them.’ I will give the priests plenty of good things. My people will have everything that they need, because of all the good things that I give to them.’ I will give the priests plenty of good things. My people will have everything that they need, because of all the good things that I give to them.’ I will give the priests plenty of good things.
korean_text: 내가 기름으로 제사장들의 마음을 흡족하게 하며 내 복으로 내 백성을 만족하게 하리라 여호와의 말씀이니라

sentences.original_text: I will give the priests plenty of good things.
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 제사장들에게 풍성한 좋은 것들을 주겠다.

sentences.original_text: My people will have everything that they need,
sentences.korean_translation: 내 백성들은 필요한 모든 것을 갖게 될 것이며,

sentences.original_text: because of all the good things that I give to them.
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 그들에게 주는 모든 좋은 것들 때문이다.

sentences.original_text: I will give the priests plenty of good things.
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 제사장들에게 풍성한 좋은 것들을 주겠다.

sentences.korean_translation: 내가 그들에게 주는 모든 좋은 것들 때문이다.
